title: demoted
body: ty game. 3 people in 2 games decide to feed. ty. ty to all the idiot people out there who deliberately feed because we lost first blood. TY

replies.body: You dont get demoted just because of one or two games. Focus on the ones that are winnable, not the ones where you have trolls or people feeding like crazy

> [{quoted}](name=McRuthless,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=UY9EPn13,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-06-29T05:01:45.027+0000)
>
> You dont get demoted just because of one or two games. Focus on the ones that are winnable, not the ones where you have trolls or people feeding like crazy

yes you do. if you're on 0 lp and you're not newly promoted, 1 or 2 games and you'll be demoted.

@op http://imgur.com/yaeL6lz
If youre not newly promoted, you had to lose some games to get back to zero then didn't ya.

> [{quoted}](name=McRuthless,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=UY9EPn13,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-06-29T09:44:51.351+0000)
>
> If youre not newly promoted, you had to lose some games to get back to zero then didn't ya.

Its possible to get a bunch of feeders or afkers in a row though, it happens.
Did you know there's less than a 1% chance you would lose 5 games in a row as a direct result of feeders if you're a decent player?

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=UY9EPn13,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2015-06-30T00:37:56.054+0000)
>
> Did you know there's less than a 1% chance you would lose 5 games in a row as a direct result of feeders if you're a decent player?

Theory is one thing, practice another.
That percentage is being generous towards those who would blame their team mates, the actually percentage, taking into consideration all factors, would probably be closer to 0.01%

Nah implying that his teammates have no skill. Anyways looks like the stats man will always think he is right. The good news is the new reform system seems to be taking care of matters nicely. Its usually those noobs that have the toxicity, lack of resolve and selfishness that we can do without.

> Nah implying that his teammates have no skill.

Which would also imply his opponents have no skill, since they're all picked from the same pool. Also implying that OP has no skill, since he's also picked from the same pool.
Yeah but those feeders are responsible for you having a lower mmr, its a team game!
It may be a team game but it's more dependant on individual skill. Fact is the ***ONLY*** common factor between all your games is you.

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=UY9EPn13,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2015-06-30T00:40:06.119+0000)
>
> It may be a team game but it's more dependant on individual skill. Fact is the ***ONLY*** common factor between all your games is you.

Yes it's dependant on skill, and when his team is feeding, there is no skill.

> when his team is feeding, there is no skill.

Implying that OP has no skill.

Actually, I'd believe that.
According to multiple sources your ***current*** MMR is about 100 points below where it should be for your ***current*** rank. Of course you got demoted.
oce.op.gg- the most trusted says otherwise...
op.gg was one of the sites I used.
right now im 55 mmr above my league so...

> im 55 mmr above my league

Umm... Not according to op.gg
on mine it says its 50 over so idk
ah back where i was this morning. i really dont c the point in me being demoted...
thats league for ya sometimes
